column4: I need a distro of ubuntu or any linux that will run on 32 mb anyone know one?
I need a distro of ubuntu or any linux that will run on 32 mb anyone know one?
anything will run - what you need to know is whether you can run a GUI.
perhaps Fluxbox will, or Enlightenment.  Lots of options.
Yes sorry i want a gnome or dke desktop enviroment i forgot to specisize
Gnome and KDE aren't going to work, sorry.
Ok is their anyother versions besides command line that will?
Like I said, try flux or E, or openbox/blackbox/matchbox, or icewm
Openbox is a .deb package how does that work?
you should install it through the package manager built into the system.  /msg ubotu software for details.
So i have to install ubuntu or something first?
Correct - you can use the !alternate CD to install a minimal system and install openbox from there.
So when i get to ubuntu terminal if the download link is http://bah.com/openbox.deb id just type in sudo wget install http://bah.com/openbox.deb
no, you don't get it from that site at all - you use apt-get.
No that was a example url openbox has a wiki with a link to a .deb package
Regardless, you won't be using any link at all - it's all built into the system.
Ok so how to i start synpatics package manager from terminal?
Synaptic is a graphical application, and not available from terminal-only installations.  Use apt-get instead.
